PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: According to the EQE curve and the solar irradiation spectrum , the integral current density value of the device is 9.70 mA cm^-2 .

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| EQE curve |
| solar irradiation spectrum |
| integral current density value |

In this paragraph, the "Property Name" entities are "EQE curve," "solar irradiation spectrum," and "integral current density value." These terms are specific to the field of solar energy and photovoltaics, and they are used to describe the performance and characteristics of a solar cell device.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

After reviewing the paragraph and the list of entities, I have determined that all of the entities clearly refer to material properties. Therefore, there is no need to remove any entities from the list. Here are the valid material property entities presented as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| EQE curve |
| solar irradiation spectrum |
| integral current density value |

The "EQE curve" is a material property that describes the external quantum efficiency of a solar cell as a function of wavelength. The "solar irradiation spectrum" is a material property that describes the distribution of solar irradiance as a function of wavelength. The "integral current density value" is a material property that describes the total current density generated by a solar cell over a range of wavelengths.
